memorycardtype: SD, SDHC, and SDXC Memory Card; Eye-Fi Card
flashmodes: P-TTL, Red-eye Reduction, Slow-speed Sync, Trailing Curtain Sync
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Selective Single Point, Tracking, Face Detection, Live View
whitebalancing: White Balance Presets (9), Custom White Balance, TTL by CMOS image sensor, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Fluorescent Light (D: Daylight Color, N: Daylight White, W: Cool White, L: Warm White), Tungsten, Flash, CTE, Manual (13)
shootingmodes: Auto Picture Mode ( Standard, Portrait, Landscape, Macro, Night Scene Portrait, Night Scene,Blue Sky, Forest ), Scene Mode ( Portrait, Landscape, Macro, Moving Object, Night Scene Portrait,Sunset, Blue Sky, Night Scene,Night Scene HDR*, Night Snap, Food )
display: 3.0 inch TFT color LCD monitor, wide angle viewing, AR coating
